data.actual_result: The tick appears, then immediately or within 1-2 seconds disappears and does not set the link to never expire.
data.expected_result: The tick should appear in the checkbox, and modify the link to be permanent the first time, not after multiple tries/spamming.
data.short_description: Trying to set invite link to permanent automatically unticks the checkbox and does not change the link.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server that has create invite links enabled. - Click on the server name in the top-ish left. - Click "Invite People". - Press the checkbox marked "Set this link to never expire". - This may take one or two tries, if it fails just exit out of the menu and recreate the invite. - Watch as your dreams collapse, showing you'll never get your hands on a precious permanent invite link.
